mapper.select: select mentee_app_code as mentorAppCode, company_code as compoanyCode, member_id as memberId, mentee_apply_date as memberApplyDate, mentee_approval_date as menteeApprovalDate, mentee_approval as menteeApproval, admin_id as adminId, previous_year as previousYear, previous_year_sales as previousYearSales, sales_suitability as salesSuitability, documentary_evidence as documentaryEvidence from mentee_apply where company_code = #{companyCode};
